name: UX Handoff Spec Template (eng ready)
description:
Design and spec, all in one place. Eng inspect components directly from the source.


Full guide: http://xinni.co/uxeng

Based on data from 277 Google engineers


How to use

  1. Start a new project with the template
  2. Use library components that correspond to code components
  3. Write notes for each screen, while referencing the cheatsheet provided
  4. Teach eng how to inspect values. A quick guide for eng is included!
